org.apache.giraph.bsp

类 BspRecordWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordWriter<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
      • org.apache.giraph.bsp.BspRecordWriter

  • public class BspRecordWriter
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordWriter<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
    Used by BspOutputFormat since some versions of Hadoop require that a RecordWriter is returned from getRecordWriter. Does nothing, except insures that write is never called.
